segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, right into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, clearly waiting for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly, almost ready to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a marvel how focused they are on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must really want them to go to such lengths.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little part of me finds their stealthy operation quite amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely oblivious to the rising water behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an adventurous pair, full of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a sight to behold their determination.
segments.speaker: PAR
